channel.title: Weird crash during the big fan room in Blast Pit
channel.description: During the room where you turn on the big fan, the game crashed after the fan turned on. I quick saved before it happened and each reload of the save resulted in a crash. Not sure why but reloading from a previous autosave fixed the problem.

item.title: Weird crash during the big fan room in Blast Pit
item.dc:creator: imadoofus
item.description:
It’s incredibly annoying. They say it’s caused by not breaking the crates above the fan, but I broke them and still crashed.

Read full topic
item.source: Weird crash during the big fan room in Blast Pit
